website_summaries.verdict: The large opening of this bag makes the entire nut milk-making process a little less messy.
pros: Bag is made from natural hemp and organic cotton threads
12 x 13-inch bag easily fits around the mouth of most blenders, making for an easy, mess-free pour
The double-stitched bags are durable and built to last multiple washes
The large bag is ideal for making bulk batches of milk
cons: Extra-large bag is not ideal for smaller batches of milk

customer_reviews.title: Chemical taste will not wash out
customer_reviews.text: Has a chemical smell that didn’t go away. How can it be chemical free? At first it was great for filtering but could not figure why the almond milk tasted off. So we washed, vinegar soaked, rinsed, and boiled. Still smells. Thinking it was organic and natural I bought 2 before realizing my purchase was the source of my bad coffee. Not impressed at all. Bought a cotton bag used it today, what a better result. Now we know the source of the bad taste.
customer_reviews.author: Tag

customer_reviews.title: Popped multiple holes AS I was squeezing nutmilk through on first use!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material tore on first use, wasting all my ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Ryan Griffith

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh how I love this hemp milk bag! I make almond milk for my family of 4 and this bag makes the job sooo much easier, and faster! I had been using cheese cloth and had to strain several times and it was hard to clean the cloth between strainings. This hemp milk bag is so closely woven I only strain once and it's done! It strains well the first time, rinses out very easily between batches and then rinses and dries well after I'm done. Do yourself a favor and get one! It's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Hisierra

customer_reviews.title: We used these for juicing and nut milk making and ...
customer_reviews.text: We used these for juicing and nut milk making and the pulp started to come out of the seams after only a week and a half of daily use...
customer_reviews.author: MJAllen

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hemp bag to strain my homemade yogurt after using cheesecloth that didn’t work so well. This bag strains my yogurt without losing any of the yogurt, and it’s easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cloe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing that I have ever purchased besides my Vitamix. I love making hazelnut and almond milk, but the little bits that don't completely blend up leave a gritty feeling. Not any more! I even keep the nut meat left from the bag to make dairy free spreads and dips. I will even use it to bake with by adding it to muffins or by making a nut crust. I will absolutely purchase a second one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew and Jenn

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Investment
customer_reviews.text: Really well constructed and works beautifully. I love that I'm able to wring out every last bit of nut milk through this. Rinses out like a dream. I'm just kicking myself for not having ordered more than one since it takes it takes quite a while to reach me. But well worth the wait! These will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Phillipa Lord

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Use this mainly for straining homemade yogurt. The weave is tight and I notice no smell other people have indicated. I clean it by spraying it out after turning it inside out and then put it to soak in my measuring cup or whatever else with soapy water. After I do the other dishes, I just scrub it on itself like I would if I were hand washing clothes, wring, and hang it to dry. The whey on my yogurt was just a tiny bit cloudy.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Mom

customer_reviews.title: Mold appeared shortly after the use
customer_reviews.text: Mold appeared on it shortly after the use. I tried everything to get rid of it - stain remover, washing in a washing machine, etc, but nothing helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to make soy milk yogurt "cheese" and it works great. It's easy to fill and I just hang it from a cabinet door handle with a bowl underneath and it drains the whey. I make sure to rinse off any residue and then wash it right away so it's clean for the next use.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Katz

customer_reviews.title: Used for 3 months before reviewing. Strong & durable for cold brewing.
customer_reviews.text: Strong, durable used for about 3 months for cold brew coffee and chicory root before I lost it while traveling. Reordered in the smaller cold brew coffee bag size which seems just a tad thinner but I’m still happy with that purchase as well. You get 2 of the small cold brew bags.
customer_reviews.author: E. Blossom

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Excellent Excellent! If you make nut milks this is the bag for you! It cleans in seconds. Seriously, nothing sticks to it! The milk runs through easily yet has zero sediment. Kudos to the makers of this product!
customer_reviews.author: ogidigirl

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: This hemp bag isn't thin and hard to clean like cotton bags. Glad I bought it. I use it vs. a sieve or juicer for celery and carrot juice. Works great. A good purchase that will last a long-long time.
customer_reviews.author: SteamyR

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag! Discolored after 2nd use followed directions accordingly.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this bag! I loved it because of it being hemp and the description being everything I wanted. However after using it about 2nd time the bag discolored after boiling it to sanitize. Kinda disappointed. I would still reorder. Totally worth it, hemp if life! So much better than organic cotton. Organic cotton doesn't have half the benefits, so hemp was the obvious choice!
customer_reviews.author: Alec and Michelle

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is "hemp" and "organic", I'm just a bit disappointed the fibers are not very tight and the result is (relatively) large openings (fine particulate is not filtered--the whole point of the product).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing product; I use it almost in a daily basic to prepare my vegan milk. Durable and easy to clean. Being vegan for over 20 years I always selected products made of plan without harmful chemicals. I strong recommend it. I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Avila

customer_reviews.title: Product shrank after washing following manufacturer's instructions
customer_reviews.text: I washed this as directed, in boiling water for fifteen minutes. Either it shrank or it was never the size it said because it is now 12 x 10, not 12 x 13, which are the dimensions on the product label. Not happy. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: ... using multiple strainers and still wound up leaving a good it of milk unstrained
customer_reviews.text: Prior to this making hemp milk was such a pain as I was using multiple strainers and still wound up leaving a good it of milk unstrained. That said, the cleaning instructions are strange
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT H.

customer_reviews.title: Makes doing homemade walnut milk a lot easier!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this nut milk bag to make my babygirl's homemade walnut milk and it works great. I blend the ingredients in my vitamix blender and then strain using this bag. Once I'm done I see all the walnut pulp in the bag. Easy to use and easy to clean. I will buy another as needed and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Better than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I expected. Used it to strain cooked pumpkin so I could use in recipes. Surprisingly easy to clean. Also strained jalapenos for jelly. After cleaning I didn't have residual pepper smell in bag like I expected. Love that it doesn't hang on to odors. I will likely buy another one or two.
customer_reviews.author: SweetAnnie50

customer_reviews.title: Very good straining bag for nut milk or cheeses.
customer_reviews.text: Used this the same day I recieved it for making Creme Frische. Worked well for straining the creme.. Drained the whey quite well. Will be using it for making cheeses next week or so. Not sure what kind yet but looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Blasterman

customer_reviews.title: Like oh my goodness what a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The bag tore at the seem the first time I used it! Like oh my goodness what a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hemp nut milk bag because it is made of safe organic materials and has helped me make the BEST almond milk! It's very easy to work with and to clean and reuse again and again. I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Fearing

customer_reviews.title: if you make your own nut milks you need to buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it !!!!!! Use it all the time just as directed, with the seem out, and it is still holding up to my squeezing. price is great for a product that will last a long time. Buy this !!!! Better quality than other products I have seen out there on the market. I use this to make my coconut milk and it has held up so well i'm going to buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Paula A. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag because I wanted to make my own almond milk and I'm so glad I did. I make my own almond milk 2 or 3 times a week and it makes the most smooth and creamy texture. The bag rinses clean and doesn't have or leave a bad taste to the almond milk. I will be purchasing more so I can make my own juice from berries.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H.

customer_reviews.title: Papa's got a brand new bag
customer_reviews.text: Having used this bag several times with no leakage and desired fluid going through it, I don't believe I'll go back to the flax or any other bag for straining my "nut milks".
customer_reviews.author: Ben G.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The hemp bag was much better quality than I expected. I'm hoping it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Urmamasama

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the quality of the cloth and the seam. It looks like it will take a solid beating.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Ashori

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to clean and great for storing food
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to clean and great for storing food
customer_reviews.author: Shin Findley

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to strain zucchini for zucchini bread. It works great and is easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Litsey

customer_reviews.title: Not great for milk
customer_reviews.text: This was hard to use and clean its a very thick material. I now use it as a bath infusser and not a milk bag.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my hemp nut milk bag. I boil it to get it clean. It’s a really reliable bag.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It absolutely strained the liquid and that’s it. Amazing for smooth hemp milk for baby.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing I milk my almonds in it I love it can’t wait to use it in other ways

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I'm new at making my own Almond Milk, I read all of the reviews and chose this brand. I'm glad I did, it was a good choice...it's easy to use and easy to clean up

customer_reviews.title: I’m using it to make celery juice with a Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: It’s very strong and can be twisted and turned til all of the “juice” is extracted.

customer_reviews.title: so it could be a good thing. We’ll see
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, but I haven’t used it yet, so it could be a good thing. We’ll see.

customer_reviews.title: Stitches ripped on a 3rd day of use
customer_reviews.text: Stitches ripped on a 3rd day of use Hard to clean. Not easy to sqeeze
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, I'd recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried seeing as the bag in pretty larger when making milk for one to two people. However, the rounded bottom made it pretty seamless. Great size, very sturdiness when squeezing the milk, and it fairly easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Good strainer
customer_reviews.text: Drains stuff. For me this is reusable milk cloth. I use it to strain and as a giant tea bag. Well worth having if you are trying to make a variety of things.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: I make my own Almond milk and I am so glad I got this bag I have used it over and over it is easy to clean and easy to use ,thinking about getting a second bag

customer_reviews.title: Best cheese cloth ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. Keeps all fine debris out. Can cut any length, and can wash many times to reuse.

customer_reviews.text: Seams are bad. Have to buy a new bag after few months of making almond milk; pulp comes through them.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is wonderful! Easy to clean, and no particles get through. I use it to filter all sorts of liquid. Turn it inside out for easy cleaning. Larger than I expected and has held up well since purchasing.

customer_reviews.title: Makes straining Almond milk a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: Use this when I make my almond milk and it is easy to use, easy to clean (I wash by hand and then boil for 15 mins, then hang to dry) and works like a charm!

customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean, very sturdy, dries quickly after use

customer_reviews.title: I love this hemp bag! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I use it for almond milk, canning and making cold brew coffee.

customer_reviews.title: Not organic
customer_reviews.text: Though the label shouts "ORGANIC", the description lists the sewing thread as the only organic part; the fabric itself appears to be just "pure hemp fabric" - nothing about it being organic. When I received the item, there was no indication of the bag being certified organic by any agency or organization at all. If you really want organic, look for a product that is certified organic.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love when it's made of hemp. I leave it out in the sun to dry.

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the "2-for-the-price-of-1" Nylon bags I've used and are ...
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the "2-for-the-price-of-1" Nylon bags I've used and are now so mis-shaped and stiff that they're difficult to use. This hemp version is a great replacement. It's a bit on the large-size for my use, but better too big than too small. So far I've only used it for making coconut milk, so I can't comment on making other kinds of nut milks, or yogurt, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Really love the size of this Hemp Nut Milk Bag. It is convenient to use. Good material also makes the drinks taste good. Thank you for great product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love! I use it a few times a week to make different but milks.

customer_reviews.title: I tried it but dont like it
customer_reviews.text: I make cold brew and thought this would be a nice way to filter the coffee. But it is kind of porous and allows to much MUD to seep thru even with coarse grind. I went back to cotton, which BTW, is natural too. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cappiello3

customer_reviews.title: Although I appreciate that the bag is made of hemp ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I appreciate that the bag is made of hemp, it is difficult to squeeze out the liquid compared to nylon bags and the pulp tends to stick to the bag.
customer_reviews.author: David Lebow

customer_reviews.title: It works great, and is a good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I used the bag for lemoncello. It works great, and is a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L Wallace

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: starts to stink after one use, impossible to really clean.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa Braun

customer_reviews.title: A+ Rating
customer_reviews.text: They only call it nut milk, because nut juice has a much more specific market. Works great though! Use it for cashew milk all the time. Cleans, dries, awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily to strain batches of cold brewed coffee. The bag is sturdy, I like that the external seams make cleaning easier, and I didn't have to re-strain the coffee like I've had to when just using a fine strainer. I'm thinking of experimenting with cheesemaking, and will probably buy another one of these for that, keeping my current one dedicated for coffee. Regardless, this one looks like it will hold up for a long time -- if it did end up ripping or if one of the seams popped open, it would be very easy to mend.
customer_reviews.author: Merc

customer_reviews.title: Not for yogurt
customer_reviews.text: I disinfected with boiling water per instructions prior to first use & the weave was not tight enough to strain yogurt. Seems like a nice bag, though, for something thicker and cleaning wasn’t as difficult as I thought it would be. If it worked for yogurt, I would definitely use it.
customer_reviews.author: ellis bell

customer_reviews.title: All Natural Hemp Bag
customer_reviews.text: It sounds very hipster (and let's face it -- it kind of is), but I follow the directions on this bag, and it works great. I even boil it to clean it like they say. haha But I like knowing that I'm using something so natural and clean when I'm making natural almond milk or cashew milk. I even used it for flax milk, and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Andis Vildavs Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I have put off for years buying a bag for nut milks, thinking that my $1 cheese cloth would not be too much different. Wow I was so wrong. This bag makes a huge difference. It is way easier to use, way easier to clean. Dries quickly. I will never use the cleese cloth again. For someone who makes nut milk almost every day, this bag makes it all so much easier. I might get a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Strong for twisting
customer_reviews.text: I use this only for celery juice. Which means I squeeze very hard and twist it. It's held up very well and is very durable. It's stained a little despite immediate cleaning and the boiling process isn't easy, but it's ideal for this use and I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: eejtalk

customer_reviews.title: The seems were hard to clean...
customer_reviews.text: All the dirt was trapped in the seems and it was time consuming to clean.... Why dont they make one without any seems which will make life much more easier and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: OA

customer_reviews.title: I love this nut milk bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this nut milk bag. I haven’t used it to make nut milks but I do use it to move the pulp from my fresh pressed juices. After using the bag there is no pulp left behind. Easy to use and easy to clean. The fabric is durable and I like that. I also like that it is all natural and free of natural and free of harmful chemicals. I love and would for sure recommend!! I will be purchasing another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for straining!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags so much, I ordered a second one! The first one we use for cold coffee filtering and the second I use for straining my homemade bone broth. They work great, clean up easily. When I first opened them, they were hard and kind of stiff but as you use them more, they soften right up. I used to go through so much cheesecloth, but now I just use these bags.

customer_reviews.title: Organic, well built, relatively easy to clean.

customer_reviews.text: Works so well and so much better than the plastic bags. I never felt safe with those. This is easy to clean and so much healthier.

I highly recommend this product to anyone who cares about their quality of health and wants and outstanding product for a super price!

I finally bought a very fine strainer and filter my almond milk a few times before bottling. It may have some almond bits in it still, but then you know your drinking almond milk

product_meta.title: P&F Hemp Nut Milk Bag Reusable | All Natural | No More Microplastic and Toxic Chemicals | Better Than Cotton | Super Healthy Strainer for Making Yogurt/Ghee/Rice | Almond Cloth Filter | 13 X 12-Inches
